fetch_root.sql_query: select top(1) content_id, content_title from el_content order by newid()
fetch_root.list_item: <input id="btn_GoToRandomContent" type="button" class="el_button_input" value="$_lang get_random_content;" onclick="el_GoToPath(ElanatVariant.SitePath + 'content/$_db content_id;/$_db content_title;.html')">
